titleStmt.title: A proposal for a new adventure, wherein none can be unfortunate greater allowance being made to the blanks, than was in the million adventure, with the same security, and managed by the same commissioners.

notesStmt.note: Item at 2760:3 imperfect: print show-through, with loss of text.
Reproductions of originals in the Trinty College (Dublin, Ireland) Library (2760:3) and Boston Public Library (2896:37).
